entry.title: Koozies - Royal Blue (C15)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 1.10

Our Neoprene Koozies are polyester covered neoprene. Made of wetsuit material and provide a superior temperature retention over foam koozies. We like our cold drinks cold! 
They fold flat when not in use for easy storage in a drawer, camper or cooler. They fit most standard size cans and bottles. 

These Koozies measure 3.5x3.5 inches.
DISCLAIMER: we try to get the exact same colour when ordering a different batch however sometimes the dye lot may be a different causing a slight change in colour.

entry.title: SLIM Can Koozies - White
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 1.50

Perfect for sublimation or htv!
Our Neoprene Koozies are polyester-covered neoprene. Made of wetsuit material and provide superior temperature retention over foam koozies. We like our cold drinks cold! 
They fold flat when not in use for easy storage in a drawer, camper, or cooler. They fit most standard-size cans and bottles. 
These Koozies measure 3.25 x 6.75 inches.
DISCLAIMER: we try to get the exact same colour when ordering a different batch however sometimes the dye lot may be different causing a slight change in colour.
For sublimation- 180C degrees for 50 seconds
For htv - please use the recommendations of your htv manufacturer

entry.title: Hand Sanitizer Holder Keyring - Neoprene 11 PATTERNS!
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 1.00 - 1.95 (10 variants)

Holds a small personal use bottle of hand sanitizer. Hand sanitizer or sanitizer bottle is not included. Empty bottles sold separately and can be found in this listing. 

Measures approx 10.5 x 6 cm

Hand sanitizer is not included. Empty bottles sold separately and can be found in this listing. 

200C degrees for 60 seconds for sublimation printing. Only styles with white space are recommended for sublimation printing. 

All styles are suitable for htv.

entry.title: Lip Chap Keychain- Neoprene 10pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 12.95

Keep your lip chap handy! A standard size lip chap will slide right inside. Keep it on your keyring or attach to the inside of your bag.

Perfect for sublimation printing or htv.

10 pieces per pack 

200C degrees for 60 seconds

entry.title: Coffee Koozies Wraps - Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 1.85

Our Neoprene take out coffee cup koozies are polyester covered neoprene. Made of wetsuit material and provide superior temperature retention over foam. With bound and finished edges for longevity. These edges won't fray and these wraps won't crumble. 

We want to keep our hands from burning up against our hot coffee cups! They fold flat when not in use for easy storage in a drawer, camper or car. They fit most standard size coffee take out cups.

Also very good for the environment. These are reusable vs the traditional cardboard koozies you get at the coffee shop and they can be customized!

entry.title: Coffee Koozies Wraps - White
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 1.85

﻿Our Neoprene take out coffee cup koozies are polyester covered neoprene. Made of wetsuit material and provide a superior temperature retention over foam. With bound and finished edges for longevity. These edges won't fray and these wraps won't crumble. 

We want to keep our hands from burning up against our hot coffee cups!

They fold flat when not in use for easy storage in a drawer, camper or car. They fit most standard size coffee take out cups.

Also very good for the environment. These are reusable vs the traditional cardboard koozies you get at the coffee shop and they can be customized!

180C degrees for 60 seconds
